Narrative: Late night fight between two teenage males at the school playground. 16YOM handed a gun to a 16YOF to hold while he was fighting. Accidentally fired killing him.

Summary: Teacher shot self in dorm, caught having affair with student
Narrative: 34YOM teacher at the residential prep high school killed himself in the dorm after he was caught having a relationship with a student.

Summary: Shooting at rival gang members, hit two children in crowd
Narrative: After soccer game, 17YOM gang member fired 7 shots at the crowd targeting members of a rival gang and then fled. The shots hit two children. Shooter fled.

Summary: Three gang members shot at by other gang members outside of school
Narrative: 3 gang members shot at by 3 other gang members on athletic courts at school. One injured. Shooter fled.

Summary: Shot at crowd after school function
Narrative: 18YOM fired at crowd leaving school function. 1 injured. Shooter fled in vehicle.

Summary: Shot fired in classroom struck wall
Narrative: Shot was fired in classroom striking the wall. No injuries. 13YOM student arrested.

Summary: Shot during fight outside of school
Narrative: 18YOM student shot 19YOM student during argument in front of school. Both were attending night classes.

Summary: Killed handling prop gun for school play that was actually a real .38 revolver
Narrative: 15YOM student was involved in production of play. He was handling a revolver that he thought was a prop gun but was actually a real .38 revolver and accidentally shot himself in the head. Parents sued the school system.

Summary: Shots fired during late night fight in the parking lot
Narrative: Planned fight between group of students in the school parking lot. 18YOM brough handgun to the fight and fired when he saw 23YOM with a knife. No knife was recovered.

Summary: Romantic Dispute, shot girl in hallway, fled and called police to surrender at a restaurant nearby
Narrative: Shooter killed female victim who she had romantic interest in and then walked to a nearby restaurant where she was detained by police. Shooter was good student and talented musician. Shooter was left to her grandparents at 6 weeks old, sexually molested by a family member at 6, severely beaten by a mother with bipolar disorder and a father now serving a 25-year prison sentence for attempted murder. She was shunned by her family when she came out as a lesbian. Shooter slashed her arm with a razor blade 70 times the night prior to the shooting. Shooter showed the gun to other students and made threats against the victim.

Summary: BB gun shattered classroom window, students were evacuated, police called for shots fired, no suspect
Narrative: Shot from a BB gun shattered a classroom window. Students inside the classroom were evacuated. Police were called for reported shots fired at the school. No suspects or motive known.

Summary: Man shot during basketball game, died in front of 40 people at youth basketball game
Narrative: 18YOM was shot by unknown suspect a school gym during youth basketball practice. Died in front of 40 youth basketball players.

Summary: Hostage standoff at school after traffic stop
Narrative: 55YOM fled traffic stop and took 11 students hostage at nearby elementary school. Tackled by state trooper after releasing hostages.

Summary: Shot teacher with pellet gun in classroom
Narrative: 10YOM student took pellet gun from principals office (unclear if it was his or belonged to another student). Went with the gun into a classroom and fired at a teacher.

Summary: Shot wife in school parking lot (custody dispute), waited for police to arrive
Narrative: 50YOM shot wife in parking lot of school. Involved in ongoing domestic dispute. Waited for police to arrive and surrendered.

Summary: Suicide in bathroom following bullying
Narrative: 14 year old male with learning disabilities shot himself in school bathroom due to relentless bullying.

Summary: Gang-related drive-by outside of school
Narrative: Drive-by shootings outside of school. Shooter targeted specific victims associated with a rival gang.

Summary: Gang related shooting after football game
Narrative: Gang-related shooting outside of football field during game. 12YOF and 19YOM shot. Unknown if victims were targeted.

Summary: Shot self in school bathroom, bullied for being gay
Narrative: 17YOM commit suicide in school bathroom. Was bullied for being gay through emails and text messages.

Summary: Planned to kill himself in front of ex-girlfriend, surrendered to school officials
Narrative: Walked into class with gun and asked girl if she "wanted to say goodbye". Had intent to kill himself. Shot into ceiling. Surrendered to school officials. Liked video games - wanted to join military after graduating high school

Summary: Student shot inside cafeteria prior to classes
Narrative: 15-year-old male student walked into the cafeteria where students had gathered prior to classes and shot another 15-year-old male student in the chest. Shooter then walked away from school after shooting. The victim had alopecia and had been a target of bullying since he was a child. Police said the shooting was specifically targeted at the victim. School was locked down and then dismissed.

Summary: Gang-related shooting outside of school.
Narrative: Suspected gang related - victim was 26 years old and was at school to pick up girlfriend's son

Summary: Shot student who stole drugs from him
Narrative: Prior to the shooting unidentified male student was caught inside shooter's home trying to steal his marijuana.  The shooter came to Wallace Elementary School with a .25 caliber handgun and saw the boy on the playground. He said, "I'm going to kill you," and fired off one round before his gun jammed. The bullet nearly hit the boy's leg.

Summary: Shot self on athletic field
Narrative: Football coach was on field and saw student standing on the other side of the field. Heard a loud pop and the student collapsed. 9th grade student. Details about victim unknown.

Summary: SRO fired at student who attacked him
Narrative: Student attacked school resource officer with a bat severely injuring him. Officer used his back up weapon to shoot/kill attacker. Justified shooting

Summary: Suicide in gym in front of 150 students following suspension
Narrative: Shooter was charged weeks prior with robbery and was suspended from school. Shooter showed up to school wearing school uniform, entered gym where 150 students were gathered, shot .38 pistol into ceiling then shot himself in the head.

School: E O Green Junior High School
Summary: Bullying, target made fun of victim for being gay
Narrative: Victim was gay. Victim asked suspect out on date in from of students which made suspect's friends laugh. Suspect was embarrassed and retaliated by shooting victim in class following day.

Summary: Prior argument with victim, handed gun to teacher after shooting
Narrative: Suspect shot victim three times then handed gun to teacher and waited for police

Summary: Argument over rap song
Narrative: Shooter and victim got into a argument about a rap song during class. The shooter fired a handgun striking the victim in the leg (minor injuries). The shooter fled the scene. No other students were injured.

Summary: Bystander student hit during gang related shooting
Narrative: Ongoing dispute between black and latino gangs - group of black teens were spotted in Latino area - Latino gang members chased group of black teens - Member of latino gang shot at group several times hitting and killing 14 YO boy outside of middle school - 6 suspects later arrested and convicted.

Summary: Shooter and friend shot gun on bus at seat
Narrative: Shooter and accomplice had just boarded school bus at school when accomplice shows shooter gun. Shooter takes gun, points it at front seat and pulls trigger. Gun goes off, bullet going between two students in forward seat and lodging in seat ahead of them. Shooter and accomplice arrested and charged.

Summary: Student shot self before class
Narrative: 13 year old boy shot himself before class - was put on life support. - no motive listed. student later died.

Summary: Accidental discharge while showing off gun
Narrative: 15 year old shooter brought gun to school to sell it - when showing it off, the gun accidentally went off striking a fellow student in the arm. Shooter arrested for aggravated assault

Summary: Planned attack, recently suspended, targeted teacher then killed self
Narrative: Shooter had been suspended from school for fighting. Shooter had 2 handguns and a backpack with ammo and knives. He shot two teachers and two other students (likely hit in cross fire). Shooter walked into empty classroom and commit suicide. Police believed the shooter had targeted specific victims. Parents reported the shooter was angry at the teachers because they would not listen to his side of the story about the fight. Other student described the shooter as odd and said he was frequently bullied for gothic appearance. He had previous domestic violence w/ weapon charge for incident at his house. Previous attempted suicide and spent time in mental health facility. Weapons: .22 caliber; .38 caliber

Summary: Shot another student with BB gun
Narrative: 15 year old shooter shot 16 year old in stomach with a BB gun after school. SRO, teacher and assistant principal chased student and he was caught after SRO used taser.

School: S Simon and Jude Catholic School
Summary: Escalation between two groups
Narrative: An altercation between two groups in the school parking lot resulted in shots being fired and two victims shot in the mouth. Shooter fled.

Summary: Hostage situation - shooter held 3 students hostage - shot handgun twice - eventually surrendered.
Narrative: Shooter fired two shots inside high school and took 30 students hostage before releasing most of them. He kept 3 girls hostage for an hour before surrendering. Possibly distraught over breakup with girlfriend the night before. Later reports were that shooter brought gun to school to kill romantic rival.

Summary: Shot 4 friends at school, MS-13 directed shooting
Narrative: 18 YOM was directed by MS-13 gang members to kill 4 friends sitting outside of the school.

Summary: Drive-by outside of school
Narrative: 14YOM and 15YOM non-students were shot during drive-by outside of school. Details unknown.

Summary: Rival gang members fired a 3 students in parking lot
Narrative: 2 gang members in a vehicle fired at 3 students who were members of a rival gang in the parking lot

Summary: Shooting during argument during basketball game
Narrative: During the game an argument arose between 22YOM (victim) and 21YOM (victim) a shooting occurred. Shooter fled the scene and turned himself in later that night.

Summary: 3 students shot by pellet gun
Narrative: For an undisclosed reason, an unidentified shooter (police believe it is the same one from Vandora Springs Elementary) shot three students with a soft pellet gun. The pellets did not penetrate the skin.

Summary: Parent shot by pellet gun
Narrative: For an undisclosed reason, an unidentified shooter fired at a parent of a student with a soft pellet gun. The pellet did not penetrate the skin.

Summary: Shot bully with BB gun
Narrative: 13YOM (victim) on the playground of Oak Haven Elementary School was approached by an 11YOM (shooter) carrying a BB gun.  The older boy was bullying the younger boy.  Our young instigator then began shooting BBs at the older boy.  He was struck in the left hand, stomach and chest.  Rescue workers treated the boy at the scene.

Summary: Fired shot in bathroom, 4 hour standoff with police before surrendering
Narrative: 15YOM student fired one shot in bathroom. Police were called and negotiated with the student for 4 hours until he surrendered.

Summary: Shots fired during argument in parking lot
Narrative: 18YOM student shot in the parking lot of the school during an argument with a group of students. Unclear if the victim was targeted. Police assigned to an event inside the school were not notified of the shooting until 45 minutes after if occured.

Summary: 2 students shot during gang fight
Narrative: Two 17YOM students were shot in what school officials suspect was a gang clash outside of Henry Ford High on Detroit's northwest side today.

Summary: Female student shot herself in the bathroom
Narrative: 15YOF student shot herself in the school bathroom.

Summary: 16 year old boy shooting pellet gun at bus loaded with children
Narrative: 16YOM started firing out of the back bedroom window.  His shots hit school bus number 313, carrying ten preschoolers ages 3 to 4. The pellets shattered the glass in the windows. The bus driver quickly moved the bus out of the boy's line of sight and called the police. She was struck in the eye by a piece of glass. The boy was arrested.

Summary: Pointed gun at two students in parking lot, shot self with approached by police
Narrative: 16YOM student pointed handgun at two students in the parking lot and made threatening statements. Student walked away from school and shot himself when confronted by police. Made statements to other students about VA Tech and constructed homemade bombs.

Summary: Planned attack after watching show about Columbine High School
Narrative: 15YOM was angry about grades and wanted to live with biological father in different state. Watched a show about the Columbine High School attack and wanted to kill as many people at his school as possible. Fired shot at the school from 150 yards away. 10 students were injured by broken glass when bullets struck the classroom windows. Fled the area and was arrested at his house.

Summary: Student showing off gun, shot himself in leg, fled the area
Narrative: 15YOM student was showing off gun in classroom. He had removed magazine but did not realize a round was in the chamber. Shot self in leg and fled the area but was arrested by police.

Summary: Shot self in leg (gun in pocket) in classroom
Narrative: 18YOM student (star basketball player) shot self in the leg during class. Student had gun in pocket.

Summary: Shot in leg during fight at basketball game
Narrative: 16YOM was shot in leg during fight between non-student during a basketball game at the elementary school. Shooter fled and was not identified.

Summary: Two students held down 3rd student and shot him with pellet gun
Narrative: Two male students (12 and 10) went into one of their school's restrooms and pulled out a pellet gun they had hidden in a backpack.  An unidentified third-grader entered the bathroom to use the facilities. The older students grabbed the younger boy, held him down and fired the pellet gun at his arm and chest. The younger student suffered major bruising to his skin, however the pellets did not penetrate his skin.

Summary: Former custodian confronts school custodian over his love interest of her
Narrative: 62YOM former custodian at East Ridge, went back to the school today to talk to a female custodian.  He had been harassing the unnamed female by trying to create a relationship, which she rebuffed.  He entered the school through an unwatched side door over an hour after classes had ended (and most students had left the building).  The two custodians got into an argument.  The argument ended when Robert attempted suicide by shooting himself in the chest with a 9mm handgun.  He was taken to Erlanger Medical Center and is listed in critical condition.  Police charged him with stalking, carrying a weapon on school property, aggravated assault, felony reckless endangerment and unlawful possession of a firearm.

Summary: Shot self in band room
Narrative: 16YOM student shot self in bandroom. Report of the shooting caused a panic with parents rushing to the school resulting in a car accident in front of the school building.

Summary: Shot ex-girlfriend and self in the parking lot
Narrative: 17YOF had transferred to school to get away from ex-boyfriend. 17YOM ex-boyfriend confronted her in parking lot of her new school and shot her than killed himself. Gun was taken from locked safe in mother's bedroom. Shooter was diagnosed with bipolar disorder.

Summary: Gang-related fight between non-students outside of school
Narrative: Group of non-students approached a group of students outside of the school after the school day. During the altercation, a shot was fired striking a student in the arm. Shooter fled the scene. No suspect was identified. Police stated the shooting was gang-related.

Summary: Shot student in arm with BB gun in bathroom
Narrative: In the boys bathroom, an unnamed male student pulled out a plastic pellet gun and shot 10YOM student in the arm.

Summary: Shot two students with airsoft gun
Narrative: A 12 year-old male student brought an airsoft-type replica submachine pistol to school with him. He removed the orange tip and fired at his fellow classmates in the sixth grade. One student was shot in the head while another student was struck in the back.

Summary: BB gun fired while showing it off
Narrative: In gym class, a male student showed off a BB gun to another male student. While the two students were looking at the gun, it went off and a BB struck the second boy in his neck.  The pellet broke the boy's skin, but did not seriously injure him.

Summary: Student shot self in parking lot
Narrative: 18YOM student shot self in parking lot.

Summary: Shot at SRO while fleeing
Narrative: A school resource officer approached the group to break up the fight and the students fled. One of the students had handgun and the SRO began chasing him.  The teen dropped the gun during the pursuit and another 16YOM student picked up the gun and fired three or four times at the SRO. The unnamed SRO was not hit.

Summary: Student (bystander) shot during fight after basketball game
Narrative: A 15YOM bystander student was shot in the parking lot of the school during a fight between non-students. Shooter was arrested away from the scene.

Summary: Student shot self in bathroom
Narrative: 17YOM shot self in bathroom.

Summary: Student shot during confrontation with 3 other students
Narrative: 17YOM student shot by group of three other teens outside of the school during a confrontation. Victim also had a handgun.

Summary: Shooting in parking lot following a car accident
Narrative: Adult male fired at a group of students in the school parking lot following an argument about a car accident a few blocks away.

Summary: 2 students shot outside of school in gang related drive-by
Narrative: 17YOM and 16YOM students shot outside of high school in gang related drive-by shooting.

School: Robert A. Taft Information Technology High School
Summary: Student with 2 guns confronted by principal, fired, and fled
Narrative: 16YOM student displayed 2 guns at school and started taunting other students. Principal grabbed him and he fired one shot (missed) and fled. Arrested away from school. Motive unknown.

Summary: Drive-by shooting outside of school
Narrative: A group of students were standing outside their school today when a car pulled up to the curb. Someone inside the vehicle pulled out a gun and fired shots at the students.  A 14 year-old girl was struck in the leg.

Summary: Shooter with paranoid schizophrenia though student was gang member plotting to kill him, surrendered after shooting
Narrative: Shooter was diagnosed with schizophrenia. Shooter believed the victim was a gang member who was going to hurt him (delusion/paranoia). Shooter fired multiple shots killing the victim in the hallway before class started. No other students were injured. Shooter surrendered to police without resistance after the shooting. Shooter had written about killing the victim in a shoot writing assignment (evidence presented in the case). Insanity plea was rejected in court. Shooter had no previous history or suggestion of violence.

Summary: Shots fired by student at car with 3 students in parking lot
Narrative: When classes were letting out, a unidentified 14YOM with a gun stepped out into the street and opened fire on a 17YOM male student's black car as he was leaving school.  Two other students were also in the car, but nobody was hurt.

Summary: Student shot self with rifle team .22 rifle
Narrative: 17YOM student who was member of the rifle team killed himself with one of the team rifles after school.

Summary: Fired pellet gun at students leaving school
Narrative: Male student fired pellet gun at his classmates as they left the building. One of the pellets struck a female student. She was stung by the hit, but was not seriously injured.

Summary: Poor grades, shot self when confronted by police
Narrative: Shooter brought hunting rifle to school. Fired two shots into the ceiling and then a fatal shot killing himself in the hallway between classes.

Summary: Officer shot trying to break up fight between gang members
Narrative: Police officer shot in arm trying to break up fight between gang members outside of school. Shooter fled and was later arrested.

Summary: Playing with gun in pocket in classroom
Narrative: 17YOM student was playing with a gun in his pocket discharged causing injuries to his leg and hand. The shooter left the classroom, hid the gun, and was able to drive himself to the hospital for treatment.

Summary: Shot rival gang member in parking lot after basketball game
Narrative: 20YOM shot 23YOM who was member of rival gang outside of high school after basketball game. Shooter had been thrown out of the game after causing a disturbance.

Summary: Shooter got out of car, shot victim in chest, and fled scene
Narrative: 14YOM was walking across school campus. Car stopped next to him, driver got out, shot student in chest, and fled the scene. No suspect or motive.

Summary: Targeted shooting during birthday party, shooter and victim had grudge
Narrative: Private party at the high school on Saturday night. 23YOM shot in targeted shooting by someone he had a ongoing conflict with. 20YOM was also hit. Shooter fled and was not identified. Facility was rented by non-students.

Summary: Security guard killed investigating car with flat tire, did not know occupant was murder suspect and it was stolen car
Narrative: 39YOM shot and killed an unarmed school security guard who was investigating his broken down car in the parking lot. The shooter had killed an elderly man and stolen his vehicle. He shot and killed the security guard in the parking lot of the school and fled. Later arrested.

Summary: Student shot herself outside of school, school officials report it was an accident
Narrative: 16YOF student shot herself outside of the school during lunch time. School officials locked down the school for 2 hours and reported to students that it was an accident.

Summary: Student accidentally fired gun inside of desk
Narrative: 8YOM student brough .22 revolver to school. While the gun was inside the desk, another student student grabbed it and accidentally pulled the trigger. School officials took possession of the weapon and detained the students. No lockdown.

Summary: Student shot multiple students with BB gun on bus
Narrative: On the bus ride home from school, a student with a BB gun opened fire on his classmates. A 12 year-old boy was struck just under his right eye and another 12 year-old boy was shot in the back of the head.

Summary: Poor grades, planned attack, surrendered when confronted.
Narrative: Shooter dressed in camo fired single shot from assault rifle into the ceiling of the school hallway. Principal confronted the student, talked him down, and escorted him out of the school. Shooter told police he wanted to scare people and "all of the teachers" were the targets. Shooter had been getting in trouble at home for having poor grades. Shooter had detailed maps and drawing of his plan at the school. Said there was a bomb but no device was found.

Summary: Shot girls in Amish school due to 20 year grudge
Narrative: Shooter barricaded himself inside of Amish schoolhouse with the female students. He tied up the female students and shot them one by one before committing suicide. Shooter called wife to tell her that he was doing this because a girl had wronged him 20 years ago. Shooter stockpiled supplies for months before the shooting. Shooter had a wife and 3 children with no prior history of mental health issues or violence. Weapons: "9mm handgun, shotgun, 30.06 rifle

Summary: Planned attack, disarmed by janitor then fired pistol at principal before being subdued
Narrative: Shooter entered school with shotgun and was immediately confronted by principal and janitor who wrestled away the shotgun. While the janitor went to call 911, the shooter was able to pull out a handgun and fire multiple shots at the principal before being subdued by other teachers. Reportedly abused by father and bullied by 25-30 students. History of mental illness and medications. Weapons: long-barrel shotgun, .22-caliber handgun

Summary: Took 6 girls hostage in classroom and sexually assaulted them
Narrative: Shooter took 6 girl hostage in a school classroom. Sexually assaulted at least one of them. SWAT team used an explosive breach after he stopped communicating with the negotiators. The breaching charge partially failed and while the second charge was being set, the shooter shot one of the victims in the head and then shot himself. Police located 5 firearms that the shooter had staged around the school campus including an AR and bolt action hunting rifle in the treeline. The shooter had a history of petty crimes and harassment of women. The shooter did not have connections to any of the victims. Shooter had threatened to shoot up a Harley Davidson dealership after they had sent him a promotional mailer. Weapons: Smith & Wesson .40-caliber; Glock 22 handgun; Smith & Wesson .357-caliber revolver

Summary: Argument over girl resulted in targeted shooting
Narrative: 17YOM shot 16YOM outside of the school. Shooter and victim had ongoing argument over a girl. Shooter fled the scene and was identified by CCTV footage.

Summary: Police Officer fired at student who was suicidal
Narrative: When the police arrived, the senior was sitting on the curb with a rifle to his head. One of the officers began talking with him. During the conversation, he pointed the rifle at the police officers. They told him to drop the rifle. When he refused, one of the officers shot him in the leg and ended the standoff around 3:45 p.m. Shooter had sent text messages to other students saying he was going to commit suicide.

Summary: SRO fired at student while breaking up fight between 10 students
Narrative: SRO fired at 15YOM student while breaking up a fight between 10 students on the school athletic field.

Summary: Shots fired into ground during a fight between parents at football game
Narrative: Shots fired during a fight between a group of parents at a football game. The gun was aimed at the ground, however, one of the bullets ricocheted off the ground and into the hand of a teenage boy.

Summary: Shooting during football game (outside gate to stadium)
Narrative: 21YOM was shot by 21YOM outside of the gates of the football stadium during a game. The game was suspended while police searched for the shooter. The shooter was arrested 7 minutes after the shooting. Motive and relationship of shooter/victim unknown.

Summary: Planned attack, surrendered immediately after first shots to sheriff's deputies in parking lot
Narrative: Shooter set of cherry bombs as a diversion and started firing sawed off shotgun at the students. The gun jammed and he was tackled by school employees. Shooter was obsessed with Columbine and made videos describing how he would carry out the attack. He wore a Colorado t-shirt and trench coat like the Columbine shooters. Wrote detailed journals about the shooting plan. He has attempted suicide and when he did not die, he became delusion and wrote in his journal that god had spared his life so that he could carry out a grander mission (shooting). Weapons: 9mm, sawed-off 12-gauge shotgun

Summary: Fired one shot in parking lot, fled, ditched gun, but was caught by officer at school
Narrative: 16YOM fired one shot in parking lot that struck a car then fled the scene. A police officer assigned to the school witnessed the shooting, then chased and detained the shooter. Shooter threw the gun as he was running but police recovered it.

Summary: Killed ex-girlfriend (teacher) at the school
Narrative: Shooter targeted and murdered his ex-girlfriend who was a teacher at the school. The school was not in session during the time of the shooting. He later attempted suicide and was apprehended by police. He also shot and killed his ex-girlfriend's mother and injured 2 other people.

Summary: Shot himself in car in parking lot after giving suicide note to friend
Narrative: 16YOM shot himself in his car in the parking lot after giving a suicide note to a friend. Student was well liked and not thought to be suicidal.

Summary: Shot during fight on basketball court at school
Narrative: 18YOM and 17YOM shot during fight between several teens during a basketball game at the school. Several teens involved fled. No suspect identified.

Summary: Shots fired during fight between adults at football game, part of Ongoing conflict
Narrative: 25YOM shot 31YOM at youth football game when fight escalated as part of an ongoing dispute.

Summary: Shot at school by two rival gang members involved in ongoing dispute with victim
Narrative: 21YOM was shot while school to attend birthday party during dispute with two rival gang members.

Summary: Showing off gun, accidentally fired striking ceiling
Narrative: 13YOM student was showing off handgun in classroom to other students. Accidental discharge striking ceiling. Shooter surrendered to teacher immediately.

Summary: Dropped off kids, husband and wife were found dead in car in parking lot, believed to be murder/suicide
Narrative: 54YOM and 38YOF were found dead from GSW in their car in the parking lot of the school. Children had been dropped off at school. Police said a murder/suicide was possible.

Summary: Students throwing bottles at cars, car chased them down and shot student 3 times
Narrative: Two students were outside of the school throwing bottles at passing cars. One of the cars stopped, chased the students down, and the driver shot 16YOM student 3 times in the back. Shooter fled and was not identified.

Summary: Fight between relatives at graduation
Narrative: Dispute between relatives of different students at graduation. A 21YOM removed his shirt and wanted to fight a 19YOM. The brother of the 19YOM shot the victim 3 times.

Summary: Gang member tried to steal silver cross of victim's brother
Narrative: Gang member attempted to steal silver cross from victims brother inside school. When the victim fled to the parking lot, the suspect shot victim.

Summary: Had rifle, knife, smoke bombs, and fireworks. Surrendered to school official in stairwell.
Narrative: 18YOM student was socially isolated, wore black trench coat every day. Teacher smelled smoke and found student in the stairwell with a rifle. Student said he was going to kill himself. Police arrived and after 40 minutes the shooter surrendered. Shooter had rifle, knife, fireworks, and smoke bombs.

Summary: Told girl over phone he was going to kill her next day, SRO confronted him in morning, pulled gun and fired one shot, and was subdued
Narrative: 19YOM called a female student and told her he was going to kill her the next day. She told the SRO and when the shooter arrived at the school, the SRO confronted him in the parking lot. The shooter pulled a handgun and fired one shot before being subdued by the SRO.

Summary: Fight in parking lot following dance
Narrative: Students fought during the school dance after water was pouring on a girl. Fight continued later in the parking lot and 19YOM student was shot in the head by an unknown shooter who fled. Multiple police officers were assigned to the school for the dance.

Summary: Fired 2 shots at ceiling and held teacher and student hostage in classroom for 2 hours then fled
Narrative: 17YOM student walked into classroom after school and fired two shots from shotgun into the ceiling. He then took a teacher and student in the classroom hostage for 2:15 before fleeing the scene. He was later arrested and taken to a psychiatric facility. Shooter was well liked, normal student without disciplinary problems.

Summary: Man running across the street fired 2 shots that struck the bus
Narrative: Unknown male running across the street fired shots. 2 struck the school bus. 2 students were injured when the bus they were riding was struck by two bullets. Shooter was unidentified. No motive known.

Summary: Students shot during drive-by walking into school building
Narrative: 19YOM (believed to be target) and 18YOF were shot during drive-by walking into high school. No suspect was identified. Motive unknown.

Summary: Planned attack, researched Columbine for weeks
Narrative: Shooter fired 3 rounds from a .38 at a targeted victim who had bullied him. One other student was struck. The shooter only had 3 rounds of ammo. A teacher subdued him. The shooter had studied Columbine and wrote detailed journal entries about it. He was tired of being called stupid by his brothers and classmates. His father had given him a collection of ammunition that included 3 .38 rounds.

Summary: Two students with BB guns ambushed another student in stairwell
Narrative: Two students with bb guns (12 and 14YOMs) ambushed another student in the school stairwell and fired at him multiple times causing minor injuries. Another student was also struck. Both were charged with felony assault.

Summary: Jealousy over girl interested in victim
Narrative: Shooter fired 4 rounds at the victim from behind then exited school and walked across the street to a restaurant. Shooter put the gun to his head but was talked down and surrender to police. Shooter was jealous that the victim was popular with girls and there had been an ongoing dispute between them. The victim had gotten in trouble recently for spitting on another student on the school bus.

Summary: Student shot in targeted drive-by outside of school
Narrative: 16YOM walking into school was shot 5 times by back seat occupant of car that pulled in front of school. When police arrested shooter, the gun was connected to another fatal drive by shooting. The shooter was involved in illegal drug dealing but unclear if high school shooting was connected.

Summary: Art teacher shot himself in the evening, found the next day in classroom
Narrative: Well liked art teacher commit suicide in classroom after school. Body was found by students the following day.

Summary: Fight in parking lot following basketball game
Narrative: Argument and fight between 3 teens and victim with female student in the parking lot following a basketball game. Victim was shot 3 times and suspect fled.

Summary: Showing off gun on bus, fired striking other student in arm
Narrative: 9 year old special ed student pulled a gun from his backpack while in the morning bus ride and shot a 10 year old. Shooting classified as accidental

Summary: Shot self in bathroom
Narrative: 16YOM student shot himself in the school bathroom.

Summary: Accidentally fired gun into floor, fragments injured two female students.
Narrative: 16YOM student accidentally fired gun into floor of classroom. Bullet fragments struck two female students.

Summary: Playing with gun outside of school
Narrative: 14 shooter brought gun to school - accidentally discharged near school gym - fragment injured 15YOF student

Summary: Shooting in parking lot behind the school, two parties in different cars, fled the scene
Narrative: Group of males in 2 different vehicle parked behind the school fired shots at each other. One male in each vehicle was struck. Vehicles fled the scene. One shooter was arrested later at the hospital.

Summary: Fired a targeted victim during dispute
Narrative: 20YOM drove to school during lunch to engage in ongoing conflict with current student just outside the cafeteria. During the dispute the shooter fired several shots that all missed and fled the scene.

Summary: Fired gun in pocket during class
Narrative: An unknown age 6th grade student was playing with a gun in his pocket. It fired and struck him in the leg. Student surrendered to the teacher.

Summary: Female student in car shot airsoft gun at boy standing outside of school, hit him in face
Narrative: 15YOF student in car shot a boy standing outside of the school with an airsoft gun in the face. She was expelled for the shooting.

Summary: Single shot fired in hallway
Narrative: Assistant principal confronted two teens in hallway. One pulled gun and fired a shot that hit the wall then fled the scene. Arrested later.

Summary: Dispute over girl, student had pellet gun and was killed by police
Narrative: Shooter brought a pellet gun to school and pointed it at another student in the classroom. The two students were involved in a dispute over a girl. There was a planned fight that was going to take place after school. The other student didn't believe it was a real weapon and started wrestling with the shooter. The gun was knocked away and the shooter ran out of the classroom with it. The shooter would not put down the gun when confronted by police and he was shot in the head. Died later in the hospital.

Summary: Shot during fight in parking lot after basketball game
Narrative: 17YOM shot in the parking lot of the school after a basketball game by a 20YOM. Police were assigned to the game and quickly arrested the shooter.

Summary: Nearby gunfire struck student on school playground (not targeted)
Narrative: Nearby gunfire struck student on playground. Police determined she was not targeted. No shooter identified.

Summary: 16 year old victim shot in HS parking lot during fight with several students
Narrative: Fight between several students in the parking lot during a basketball game. Related to prior fight. Shooter fled and was not identified.

Summary: Shooting resulted from a large fight involving 40 students after school
Narrative: Group of 40 student involved in a fight outside of the school. Dispute between different gangs (neighborhood cliques). Two students were injured by gunshots from an unknown shooter in the group.

Summary: Two non-students shot after entering school
Narrative: While the students were leaving the building for first dismissal, two non-students entered the building via a side door that students opened up for them. Unclear who fired shots and one of the non-students was shot.  Pepper spray was also discharged.  The wounded individual was taken to the hospital for treatment. Unknown shooter fled the scene.

Summary: Student killed by 5 members of rival gang
Narrative: 16YOM was shot and killed by 5 members of a rival gang near the school athletic field. Shooter fled and 5 males were later arrested.

School: Boston Day and Evening Academy (High School)
Summary: Fight in bathroom, fired shots and missed then fled
Narrative: 17YOM was involved in fight in the bathroom of the school. Fired shots that missed other students. Fled the scene and later turned himself in the police.

Summary: Officer killed burglary suspect in parking lot
Narrative: Officer shot and killed burglary suspect in school parking lot. School locked down.

Summary: Shooter shot victim on bus due to earlier confrontation
Narrative: Fight on a bus between 2 female students involved in ongoing conflict. 17YOF student shot another 17YOF student then fled the scene. She later turned herself in to police.

Summary: Trading gun for RX drugs
Narrative: Shooter stole a .22 handgun from his father and brought it to school to trade for RX drugs. A school administrator found out about the handgun and confronted the shooter. He shot at the principal and 2 other school employees then fled the scene. Shooter had snorted multiple xanax prior to the shooting. Shooter had been arrested previously for threatening his father with a firearm at his home and for a seperate assault. Shooter had history of drug and alcohol abuse.

Summary: Group of teens fired multiple shots at school security guard following fight in parking lot
Narrative: Nassau police are looking for a group of attackers who shot a security guard's car after he followed them from a South Farmingdale High School pep rally. No one was injured in the shooting that occurred Friday at about 7:45 p.m. near the intersection of Lincoln Street and Intervale Avenue, police said. Shortly after the football pep rally, the guard drove up to the group after he saw them arguing with students. As the guard approached, the group split up, got into three cars and drove off campus. The guard, whose name wasn't released, followed them until they stopped at the intersection. The guard told police that the attackers got out of their cars and ran toward him before he heard gunshots. He was uninjured. It remained unclear if the group of men were students.

Summary: Bystander shot in leg during HS football game, student had gun in pocket
Narrative: 17YOM student had gun in pocket at football game. Discharged striking the leg of another student. Fled the scene. Found by a police dog.

Summary: Victim shot in parking lot of elementary school where son attended - gang related
Narrative: 37 year old victim - known Villa Posse gang member, was approached in parking lot of his 5-year old son's elementary school - victim shot in torso - later died - suspect still at large.

Summary: 15 year old shooter opened fire in cafeteria striking another student in chest
Narrative: Two 15 year old students who knew each other in juvenile detention were involved in a conflict that left one student shot in the chest. The shooter fled but was caught by the school security and the gun was recovered.

Summary: Student shot in school parking lot as part of Ongoing conflict
Narrative: 16YOM was shot in the parking lot by a 17YOM who got out of vehicle and then fled in the same vehicle. Shooter and the victim knew each other and had Ongoing dispute.

Summary: Student shot during fight with 6 other students
Narrative: 16YOM student was approached by a group of 6 students outside of the school. During the fight, he was shot in the leg and the group of teens fled. Police said it was not related to gang activity.

Summary: Fired shot into ceiling then surrendered to school administrator
Narrative: 17YOM dressed all in black with mask and took disassembled shotgun in bag into bathroom. When shooter put the gun together, other students told him that they didn't believe it was a real gun. Shooter fired into the ceiling and students fled. School principal heard the shot, ran to the bathroom, and ordered shooter to surrender. The shooter put down the gun and the principal subdued him. Principal said the shooter has multiple mental health issues and believed the incident was an attempted suicide or cry for help but other students were not in danger.

Summary: Drive-by shooting. Possible feud or gang escalation
Narrative: Drive-by shooting when hundreds of students left homecoming dance. 15YOM shot in leg and 14YOF shot in shoulder.

Summary: Fight involving multiple students at end of day
Narrative: Fight occured at the end of the school day between multiple students. During the fight, the shooter fired a .25 handgun striking another student in the foot. A police officer assigned to the school immediately arrested the shooter.

Summary: Shooting stemmed from misunderstanding over a girl
Narrative: Victim was shot in stomach during early dismissal. Shooter - 21 year old non student shot victim due to girl

Summary: Shots during fight in parking lot
Narrative: Two students were fighting over a girl in the school parking lot. A third student fired multiple shot at them but all of the shots missed. 15YOM arrested the next day.

Summary: Three students were handling weapon when it accidentally fired striking victim; plotting to kill teacher
Narrative: Three students were handling a handgun in the boys bathroom when it went off striking another student in the leg - it was later revealed the students had plotted to kill a teacher who earlier disciplined one of the boys.

Summary: 2 males shot in school parking lot by unknown shooter
Narrative: Unknown shooter fired at a group of students and non-students in the parking lot. 18YOM and 21YOM were injured. Shooter fled.

Summary: Shot during argument outside of school
Narrative: 15YOM walking with 2 other teens outside of school was shot and killed during dispute with 26YOM shooter in vehicle. Shooter fled the scene and was later arrested.

Summary: School maintenance worker shot while in school maintenance shop by two masked men
Narrative: School maintenance worker was shot when two masked gunmen ran into the maintenance shop at approximately 7:30am and shot the worker. Suspects fled the scene. Police believed the shooter was related to evidence the victim had against someone.

Summary: Police tried to break up fight between female students, brother fired at officers killing one
Narrative: Two female students were fighting in the parking lot. When police arrived to break up the fight, male students tried to stop them. Shots were fired striking both officers (one fatally). The injured officer was able to return fire striking the shooter who ran away. Shooter and multiple others were arrested in connection with the officer's death.

Summary: 3 shot during fight between 20 people at school
Narrative: Three males shot during fight between 20 males outside of school. Fight occured on a Sunday evening and appears unrelated to the school.

Summary: Fired BB gun at students during drive-by
Narrative: 17YOM opened fire on his classmates with a BB gun while he was in a moving vehicle.  Two students received minor wounds from the flying pellets and were taken to Vassar Hospital for treatment.  Jeremy was arrested and charged with criminal possession of a weapon, felony attempted assault, two counts of felony assault and two misdemeanor charges for reckless endangerment.  He bonded out of jail with $10,000 and his court date was scheduled for June 21, 2005 at 3:00.

Summary: Student shot self in leg outside of school put pistol into pocket
Narrative: 16YOM student shot self in leg putting pistol into pocket outside of high school. Student left the gun outside during the day to avoid metal detectors. Student threw the gun over a fence after the shooting.

School: Academia Ana Marie Sandoval Montessori School
Summary: Unknown shooter fired BB gun at playground striking teacher in the neck
Narrative: Unknown gunman fired BB gun at school playground striking on teacher in the neck and another in the leg. Both teacher were transported to the hospital. No info on gunman or motive.

Summary: Showing off airsoft gun in parking lot, accidentally fired injuring 2 students
Narrative: 19YOM was showing off airsoft pistol to two students in the parking lot. Gun discharged causing minor injuries to both. 19YOM was charged with aggravated battery.

Summary: Student's mother was killed by ex-boyfriend in the parking lot then commit suicide
Narrative: While 32YOF (student's mother) was waiting to pick child up in the parking lot, she was shot and killed during a dispute with her ex-boyfriend (47YOM). He then commit suicide.

Summary: Fight in high school parking lot following earlier fight broken up by police, shots fired
Narrative: Fight between two groups of students from different high schools at a skatepark. Police were called and broke it up. Both groups of students met later at the high school parking lot. Shots were fired injuring a 18YOM. 17YOM was later arrested.

Summary: Shot fired at window of the school office
Narrative: 17 year-old male shooter fired a shot at a school window and that struck the secretary.  She was taken to the hospital for treatment.  Police were able to recover a shell casing and later arrested the shooter.

Summary: Student fired gun in pocket, students in the class fled the scene, threw gun in sewer drain
Narrative: 15YOM was playing with gun in pocket when it fired in classroom. Students fled the area. No injured. Student threw gun in sewer drain but it was found by school officials.

Summary: Shot football coach for benching his son
Narrative: Father of football player was angry at coach for benching his son and had multiple violent arguments. 44YOM drove to the school, shot coach in the chest, and fled the scene.

Summary: Accidental discharge in classroom
Narrative: Handgun being carried by a 17YOM accidentally went off. Shooter fled the classroom holding his leg, however, he only received a minor powder burn.

Summary: Accidental discharge of gun in student's purse
Narrative: As 17YOF reached into her purse and the loaded gun she had in there went off.  The bullet struck her in the arm.  She was transported to the Regional Medical Center for treatment of bullet wound and was charged as a juvenile for bringing a weapon onto school property.

Summary: Accidental discharge in pocket during class
Narrative: Shooter was playing with gun in his pocket and accidentally fired shooting himself in the leg. The shooter told other students not to tell the teacher and tried to blend in with the crowd leaving the school. Shooter gave gun to a classmate to hide (also charged and expelled following the incident).

Summary: Planned attack on school, studied Columbine, wore trench coat, had been bullied
Narrative: Shooter killed his grandfather who was a tribal police officer and took his department issued shotgun and handgun plus a ballistic vest to the school. Shooter fired in the hallway and a classroom killing and injuring multiple students. When shooter was engaged by law enforcement, he went into a classroom and commit suicide. The shooter was obsessed with Columbine and other mass shootings. School officials were aware of violent journal entries he wrote about mass shootings. He told other students about his plan to attack the school (one was arrested for conspiracy but charges were dropped). Shooter was bullied and dressed like the Columbine shooters wearing a black trenchcoat and dark makeup. Shooter's father had commit suicide and mother was severely injured in car accident; placed into custody of grandparents. Shooter was on increased dosage of prozac at the time of the shooting. Weapons: .40 caliber; 12-gauge

Summary: Bystand student struck when shots were fired during fight
Narrative: Victim caught in the crossfire of an ongoing dispute. Unidentified shooter fled and gun was not recovered.

Summary: Victim accidentally caught in cross fire of gang related shooting
Narrative: Victim was accidently stuck by a bullet fired from 18 shooter who was involved in a gang related shooting. Shooter later arrested and charged. Victim died 8 days later.

Summary: Drive-by in retaliation for prior shooting
Narrative: Three males (17, 21, 22) fired an AK47 at a vehicle in the school parking lot occupied by 3 students. Shooting was related to a prior shooting between the groups of males. One student was killed and two were injured. Shooter fled and were later arrested. During the trail, a key witness was murdered. Unclear if gangs are involved.

Summary: Student showing off gun in classroom shot himself in hand
Narrative: 7YOM was showing off gun in classroom and shot himself in the hand putting it into his backpack.

Summary: Drive-by when people were leaving meeting at school
Narrative: After a meeting at the school, the participants walked out onto the grounds and into the parking lot to their vehicles.  As they mingled, a car pulled up on the street and the driver stuck his arm out the window with a handgun and opened fire on one of the groups. A Dallas City Parks and Recreation Department employee was grazed in the leg leg.

Summary: Shots fired during argument between expelled student (shooter) and other students
Narrative: 16YOM shooter had been expelled from school. In the parking lot, he had a confrontation with 3 other students that resulted in a shooting.

Summary: Killed bus driver because she had reported his tobacco use
Narrative: Shooter fired multiple shots killing the bus driver while the bus was on the way to school. The bus crashed into a utility pole but nobody was injured. The bus driver had reported the shooter for chewing tobacco on the bus. Shooter was a good student and had no history of violence. Shooter reported he was depressed, suicidal, and hearing voices at the time of the shooting.

Summary: Fight as school dismissed
Narrative: Student was shot in the leg (caught in the crossfire) during a fight between multiple students when the school was dismissing.

Summary: Gun was dropped and discharged
Narrative: 15YOF (sister) and 19YOM (brother) were on school grounds. Brother was holding gun, the gun dropped, and it discharged a bullet into Angela's neck.

Summary: Fired shots at another student in hallway, prior fight with shot fired away from school
Narrative: 15YOM fired 3 shots in the hallway at another student he had an ongoing conflict and prior gun battle with. All of the shots missed. Shooter fled the scene. Shooter was arrested at a relatives house. The gun used was linked to an unsolved homicide in the area.

Summary: Killed by rival gang member outside of school
Narrative: 18YOM student waiting outside of high school was shot and killed by rival gang member. 4 teens from a rival gang were involved in the shooting and fled together. Group of teens involved attempted to intimidate witnesses following the shooting.

Summary: Cafeteria worker shot coworker and then killed himself
Narrative: Cafeteria worker shot coworker 3 times and then shot himself. Motive unclear.

Summary: Shot in parking lot by masked gunman
Narrative: 18YOM shot in the school parking lot inside his car by a masked gunman. No other information available.

Summary: Shot himself in front of school, reported he had fireworks and multiple types of ammo
Narrative: 16YOM student shot and killed himself in front of school. Reported that he had fireworks and multiple types of ammo in his backpack. Online blog had violent imagery and references to shooting and bombing school. Teachers and students said he was a good kid and varsity athlete. Students reported he had been teased for being queer.

Summary: 4 students playing with gun in car, one shot in leg, claimed a driveby
Narrative: 4 students were playing with a gun in the car, accidentally fired striking one of the students. Called 911 and told police they had been in a drive by shooting.

Summary: Fired gun in bathroom, ran into class with gun, arrested by police
Narrative: 14YOM fired gun in bathroom, ran into a classroom, and was arrested by police.

Summary: Argument during basketball game
Narrative: Argument between 20YOM shooter and 19YOM victim escalated into shooting during basketball game. Shooter fired 2 shots and fled the area.

Summary: Argument between two men, mother picking up child shot in crossfire
Narrative: Parent shot picking child up from school. Men in two different vehicles fired at each other as part of ongoing dispute.

Summary: Shot later after slapping woman
Narrative: After the basketball game with Ensley High School had wrapped up around 9:00, a female told a group of males that a man had slapped her across her face. She told the group of males that her attacker was a 20YOM.  As Antwin left the gym, the group of males drove by and shot him in the abdomen. Police arrested 20 year-old Obray Carter at the school and charged him with attempted murder.

Summary: Killed by unknown shooter in parking lot, believed to be gang related
Narrative: 32YOM found shot dead in the school parking lot. Witnesses reported seeing a car leaving the area but no other info about the shooting. Police believe the shooting is gang related.

Summary: Fight over girl, two random students were shot
Narrative: Fight over girl in the school courtyard. 16YOM student fired shots striking two students who were not involved and fled.

Summary: Gang related shooting at football game
Narrative: 19YOM shot at 17YOM during football game. Police said the shooting was gang related. Shooter fled in a vehicle after shooting.

Summary: Two men fatally shot each other in dispute over woman
Narrative: Two 25YOM shot each other in the school parking lot during a domestic dispute over a woman.

Summary: Attempted to get into ex-girlfriend's house, fired 2 shots into air, walked to high school and shot himself
Narrative: 15YOM was upset about breakup. Went to ex-girlfriend's house with shotgun but parents would not let him inside. He fired two shots into the air. Walked to high school and shot himself on the steps.

Summary: Shooter called ex-girlfriend, current boyfriend and friends came to school to confront him
Narrative: Early morning fight on the school grounds. Shooter had called his ex-girlfriend angering current boyfriend. They all met at the school parking lot in the morning. Shooter fired 3 shots and drove away. Later arrested. Shooter was using methamphetamine at the time.

Summary: Fired shot into school ceiling during fight between 2 groups of students
Narrative: 16YOM fired handgun into the ceiling during fight between two groups of students then fled the area.

Summary: Adult female shot student when he became aggressive and reached for gun
Narrative: 34YOF (unknown relationship) saw a 16YOM student smoking marijuana at noon behind the school. She approached him and he became belligerent and aggressive. He pushed her away and reached under his shirt for a weapon. Female drew her .38-caliber revolver and shot the boy in the foot.

Summary: Argument in parking lot while victim was waiting to pick up brother, shot in chest
Narrative: 22YOM shot while waiting to pick up brother at school. Had argument with another man and was shot in chest. Police said the shooting was gang related.

Summary: Shot fired during fight in classroom
Narrative: 17YOM tried to stop a fight between group. 16YOM pulled a handgun and fired a shot at 17YOM. Shot hit the classroom door and no one was injured.

Summary: Band member shot fellow band member during break
Narrative: 16YOM was shot in the shoulder by a fellow band member. The shooting took place on one of the school's parking lots around 8:45 a.m. Police took the unnamed shooter in to custody shortly after the shooting and charged him with attempted murder.

Summary: Gang-related drive-by in retaliation for prior fight
Narrative: Group of students outside of school flashed gang signs and threw bottles at a passing car. The car stopped and fired multiple shot striking two students then fled the area. Police said the shooting was gang related.

Summary: Murder suicide of husband killing wife (cafeteria worker)
Narrative: 52YOM shot and killed his 39YOF estranged wife in the parking lot at 6:00 AM. She worked in the cafeteria. No students were present. Shooter immediately commit suicide after shooting her.

Summary: Gang related shooting outside of school, bystander female student struck
Narrative: 19YOM was shot during confrontation with 3 gang members. Female student was also struck. All three gang members fled and were arrested.

Summary: Fight after basketball game
Narrative: Rival groups of students had multiple fights during the week leading up to a charity basketball game. After the basketball game, a fist fight started and escalated into a shooting. The shooter fired multiple shots into the crowd injuring multiple uninvolved students. School administrators were aware of the brewing violence between the groups and had attempted to de-escalate them during the week.

Summary: Multiple shots fired outside of school, no injuries
Narrative: Unknown teen fired multiple shots outside of the school and then fled. No students were injured but school was locked down for 3.5 hours.

Summary: Shot self in class infront of teacher and 18 students
Narrative: 13YOM student carried gun into class in guitar case. At end of class, he took the gun out and shot himself in the chest.

School: Saledad Enrichment Action Charter High School
Summary: Gang related drive by shooting
Narrative: 20 students were standing in front of the school when shot were fired from a vehicle striking a 17YOM and 16YOM student. Police believed the male student shot was targeted due to gang affiliation.

Summary: Teacher shot by fiance, he fled and shot himself 30 minutes later
Narrative: 41YOM shot and killed his 19YOF fiance who was a teacher at the k-12 Christian school. Fled the scene and killed himself 30 minutes later. Shooter was a reserve police officer.

Summary: Student shot during carjacking in parking lot
Narrative: 17YOM student shot during attempted carjacking in the school parking lot. Shot fled into school and changed clothes in locker room. Gun was not recovered.

Summary: Shootout between drug deals, student and teacher hit in cross fire
Narrative: Two drug dealers in a feud over territory fired 90 shots at each other striking a student and teacher on the playground of the elementary school. Both were later arrested. Weapons: carbine rifle, assault weapon

Summary: Planned attack, sent texts warning others, tackled after first shot
Narrative: 16YOM went into bathroom and sent text message to girl warning her to get out of school. Had been talking about school shooting for past two week including watching "Bowling for Columbine". Wore black trench coat. Walked out of bathroom with shotgun and fired at a student but missed. Tackled by the asst principal. Fired again striking another teacher in the leg before being subdued. Shooter was considered a good student and did not have disciplinary issues. Described as shy by classmates. Told other students about his plans to shoot up the school.

Summary: Police officer fired at student in vehicle in parking lot
Narrative: Student had been involved in fight with other students. He drove a stolen car into a staff only parking lot. Officer fear his life was in danger at fired at the student in the vehicle. Shots missed and no one was injured.

Summary: Showed off gun, fired when he put it into waistband of pants striking himself
Narrative: 12YOM student was showing off gun to other students in the classroom. Fired when he put it back into the waistband of his pants.

Summary: Multiple fights between shooter and victim
Narrative: Ongoing dispute between two students had resulted in multiple fist fights. During a fist fight, the shooter pulled a handgun and fired multiple shots killing the victim. The school and the parents were both aware the fights and had attempted resolution.

Summary: Domestic, shooter killed man in parking lot and went into school looking for ex-girlfriend (teacher); took her hostage; confronted by police officer and killed
Narrative: Shooter had troubled relationship with an ex-girlfriend who was a teacher at the school. Shooter killed an adult male in the parking lot (likely her new boyfriend) and went into the school. Shooter took the ex-girlfriend hostage for 20 minutes before walking her out to the parking lot where he was shot and killed by a police officer investigating the shooting. Students were in the school during the incident but were not harmed.

Summary: Students passing .22 pistol, went off, female student shot but didn't notice pain until later, teacher thought it was firecracker
Narrative: Two 17YOM students were passing a .22 pistol in the classroom. The gun went off striking a 16YOF student. She did not immediately realize she had been struck, later determined the bullet was 2" from her heart. Teacher thought a firecracker went off. Wasn't determined to be a shooting until later. Student holding the gun was arrested later.

Summary: Shooting between rival gangs in school parking lot
Narrative: Shooter fired 15 shots at rival gang members in car parked in the school parking lot killing one and injuring one. Shooter then shot himself to make it appear that it was self defense and had his brother drive him to the hospital.

Summary: Drive-by in school parking lot, Ongoing dispute with target
Narrative: Shooter and 2 others in a vehicle fired +20 rounds from a Tec-9 machine gun at a 18YOM in a vehicle with 3 of people in the school parking lot. A basketball game had recently ended but police said the shooting was not related to it. The shooter had an ongoing dispute with the target. The shooter fled the scene in the vehicle and was later arrested.

Summary: Shot fired in bathroom by unknown shooter, gun found in stall, no suspect
Narrative: Students and teacher heard gunshot. School was locked down. Police found a .38 revolver that had been fired in a bathroom. No suspect identified.

Summary: Shooting in parking lot after basketball game during argument that started in gym
Narrative: 17YOM shot 33YOM football coach in the parking lot following an argument they had during a basketball game. Shooter fled but was quickly arrested by a police officer assigned to the school.

Summary: Fight outside school gym, shot fired striking uninvolved female student
Narrative: Single shot fired during large fight between multiple students. Female student was struck. First believed she was punched and it was later determined that she had been shot in the nose.

Summary: Suspect stopped by police on school playground - refused to drop gun - was shot.
Narrative: Police officer shot and killed a man who pointed a revolver at the officer on the field of the school.

Summary: Accidental discharge in students pocket
Narrative: Handgun in a 15YOM students pocket discharged grazing two other students.

Summary: Fight between large group of males following football game, uninvolved female student was shot and killed
Narrative: 21YOM fired shot during large fight after football game striking 17YOF student in the head. Shooter fled the scene and was later arrested.

Summary: Gang related shooting, two bystander students struck
Narrative: Gang related shooting outside of homecoming dance. Two bystander students were struck. Unknown teenage shooter fled the scene.

Summary: Pulled gun, took teachers car keys, kidnapped other student, drove car in police chase
Narrative: 14YOM pulled handgun in classroom and forced teacher to give him car keys. Pointed gun at 12YOM student and took him hostage. Took student to parking lot, got in vehicle, and involved in 14 mile police chase. Shooter surrendered when police blocked highway. No injuries.

Summary: Argument over car being broken into, third student shot at two arguing
Narrative: Two students were arguing over a car being broken into in the parking lot. Shooter was friends with one of the students and opened fire severely injuring a 17YOM student.

Summary: Suicide by cop, depressed over breakup
Narrative: 18YOM brought duffel bag with shotgun, fake pistol, and baseball bat into classroom. Told the students and teacher to leave. Principal entered classroom and tried to talk him down. When police arrived, shooter walked outside to confront them. Principal tried to wrestle away shotgun when he pointed it at officers. Shooter was shot by police and principal was hit in leg by round (unclear if it was shooter or from police officer).

Summary: Pulled gun in hallway, fired into classrooms, tackled by SRO
Narrative: 13YOM called out girls name in hallway, pulled pistol, fired two shots in the air, and fire shots into random classrooms. School was locked down and the shooter tackled by a sheriff's deputy working in the school. The shooter fought the deputy for the gun but he was able to detain him. The shooter had been identified as a possible threat by school officials.

Summary: Targeted two bullies, other students in area were not shot at
Narrative: Shooter had been bullied by victim. Shooter snuck gun past metal detectors and ambushed the victim when he came out of the locker room. Shooter fired multiple rounds, one missed and struck another student in the throat killing him. Victim ran from the shooter and the shooter chased him, eventually catching him and firing multiple shots to kill him. School officials found the shooter with an empty weapon and detained him until law enforcement arrived. Shooter had schizophrenia and described an imaginary friend who wore a black trench coat and told him to plan the shooting.

Summary: Took 3 students hostage in classroom for an hour, shot by police
Narrative: 17YOM walked into classroom during lunch and pulled gun. Told teacher to leave and fired shot at her. Blocked door and held 3 students hostage. Discharged fire extinguisher. Shot by police officers when he climbed on top of a bookcase. Father reported the shooter was hearing voices and on pain medication. Recently watched the movie "Phone Booth" about a hostage standoff.

Summary: Fired shot in bathroom, surrendered to teacher who investigated
Narrative: 13YOM fired a .44 revolver in the bathroom of the school. A teacher went to investigate the sound of the gun shot and found the shooter sitting on the floor. The shooter peacefully went with the teacher to the principal's office. Shooter was reported to have psychological problems and possible attempted suicide.

Summary: Shot a specific victim during dismissal, missed hitting other student and police officer
Narrative: 14YOM fired at the crowd leaving the high school aiming for an intended target (possible rival gang members). Bullet struck a bystander student and a school police officer. Shooter fled the scene and was detained a few block away.

Summary: Ongoing feud resulted in shooting at school stadium
Narrative: 20YOM shot 20YOM outside of the school stadium as a result of an ongoing dispute. Unclear if either were related to the school. Students were in the area at the time of the shooting. Building was locked down.

Summary: Brought duffel bag with 7 weapons, shot self in bathroom
Narrative: 13YOM brought duffel bag with 7 guns (3 rifles, 2 shotguns, 2 handguns), dressed in camo, and hundreds of rounds of ammo to school. Went to school bathroom. Reported he was going to supply three other students with weapons but they backed out at the last second and said they were going to call the police. Police were alerted for a report of a student with weapons in the bathroom. 10 minutes later, the shooter commit suicide when police approached the bathroom.

Summary: Commit suicide in parking lot
Narrative: 18YOM student commit suicide in parking lot.

School: Red Lion Area Junior High School
Summary: Recently disciplined by principal
Narrative: Students were gathered in cafeteria before the school day. Shooter stood up and fired two close range shots at the principal and then immediately put the gun to his own head and commit suicide. 700 rounds of ammo in backpack and 3 handguns. Good student. Described as quiet and socially isolated. Recent break-up with girlfriend. Recently disciplined by principal for minor issue. No indication of prior planning or statements to other students. No suicide note. Psychologist believed he pulled the gun to show off and it went off by accident. He then killed himself in a panic. Weapons: .44 caliber .22 caliber .357 caliber

Summary: Student shot herself in bathroom
Narrative: 12YOF student shot herself in the school bathroom

Summary: Gang members targeted rival gang member in school gym
Narrative: Three shooters snuck handguns and an AK47 passed metal detectors and armed school guards then opened first on rival gang members in the school gym. Shooter fled the scene after the shooting. Two female students were hit in the crossfire. Victim was targeted. Students and school officials said the shooting was gang related. Weapons: AK-47-style semi automatic rifle, semi automatic handgun

Summary: Showing off gun, struck friend in stomach
Narrative: 18YOM student was showing off gun to 18YOM classmate. Discharged and struck him in stomach. Shooter fled the scene and was turned into police later by mother. School had metal detectors in the main building but the shooting occurred in an auxiliary classroom.

Summary: Student fatally shot himself inside cafeteria during lunch
Narrative: An 18-year-old student who was having issues with his girlfriend fatally shot himself in the school cafeteria during lunch time. Classes were not cancelled. Counselors were available to students.

Summary: Gang-related fight in hallway between students
Narrative: 15YOM student shot 16YOM student in the leg during a fight in the hallway. Students were members of rival gangs.

Summary: Man shot during gang dispute because of belt color
Narrative: 20YOM shot 30YOM in the head during a gang related dispute outside of the school. The victims had the belt color of a rival gang.

Summary: Student shot self in bathroom
Narrative: 15YOM student shot himself in the bathroom of the school. His body was found by another student. Shooter had been depressed since his aunt had recently shot and killed his uncle.

Summary: Talked with principal, pulled out gun, and shot himself in office
Narrative: 17YOM student was talking with the principal in his office about his problems. Student said the principal couldn't help, student pulled out rifle from under jacket and shot himself. Transported to the hospital and survived.

Summary: Shots fired during fight, missed target, shooter fled
Narrative: 14YOM fired 4 shots during fight with another 14YOm student. All shots missed and the shooter fled but was chased by a police officer and arrested a few blocks from the school.

Summary: Student climbed on roof, threatened to shoot himself, surrendered to police after 2 hours
Narrative: 17YOM student climbed on top of school roof with handgun and threatened to kill himself. Student pointed the gun at himself and police officers during the standoff. Student was upset about recent death of father. Surrendered to police officers after 2 hours.

Summary: Took student hostage, walked him down hallway, surrendered to SRO
Narrative: 12YOM walked into classroom and told male student to come out to the hallway. He held him hostage at gunpoint and walked down the hallway. Shooter was confronted by SRO and surrendered a few minutes later to SRO and other police officers. Motive is unclear. Shooter had handgun and knife.

Summary: Shooting outside school following prior altercation
Narrative: 18YOM student was killed protecting his 17YOF student sister during a confrontation outside of the school following a prior altercation with a 17YOM earlier that day in the school.

Summary: Shot at school window from across the street then shot self
Narrative: 13 YOM fired rifle at school window (broken glass injured two students inside). Shooter then fired and killed himself.

Summary: Accidental discharge, shot self
Narrative: Shooter accidently shot himself in leg

Summary: Former student with shotgun forced students into cafeteria, splashed gasoline, wanted to light school on fire
Narrative: 18YOM former student who was expelled for stealing a car, walked into the school with a shotgun looking for the principal. When the shooter was told the principal no longer worked there, he splashed gasoline in the halls and forced students into the cafeteria where he splashed gasoline around them. When he attempted to light the gas on fire, he was tackled by school officials and students. Subdued until police arrived. Following his arrest, the shooter claimed to have left bombs at two other school but no explosive devices were found.

Summary: Multiple shots fired by unknown person on the school grounds, 2 struck
Narrative: Multiple shots were fired by someone on the school grounds during an after school event. A 12YOM student and a 21YOM standing across the street were both shot (no relation). No shooter was identified.

Summary: Shot wife and son in school parking lot
Narrative: 43YOM shot at wife and son in school parking lot then fled the scene.

Summary: Shots fired during fight in school hallway
Narrative: One shot was fired during a physical altercation between two students in the hallway of the school prior to classes starting. Shooter fled the scene. School had metal detectors and armed guards. Two fatal shootings near the school during the same time period related to gang activity.

Summary: Serial Sniper Victim
Narrative: Student shot outside of school by serial sniper who killed 17 random victims

Summary: Shot herself in the school parking lot in front of other students
Narrative: 13YOF student shot herself in the school parking lot in front of other students. She was being treated for depression and had be admitted to psychiatric hospital. Previous suicide attempts.

Summary: Gang related shooting in parking lot
Narrative: Shooter pulled into school parking lot at approximately 3:30PM and yelled something at the two victims prior to shooting a small caliber handgun in their direction. The victims were attempting to jump start their car at the time - no one was injured, but students were in the area which caused the suspect to be charged with additional crimes. It was later deemed to be a gang related shooting based on the victims having beaten up the shooter's younger brother on a prior occasion.

Summary: Armed security guards playing quick draw game, gun went off killing one
Narrative: Two security guards were outside of school dance. They were playing a quick draw game with their guns. One guard pulled his gun and the other karate kicked it out of his hand causing it to fire (struck in the chest and died).

Summary: Officer shot teen behind the school
Narrative: Officer approached two teens behind the school late at night. During a struggle, 14YOM was fatally shot in the head, second teen fled the area.

Summary: Student had list of 8 teachers to kill and 50 rounds of ammo, surrendered to police officer
Narrative: 13YOM student walked into classroom with 35 students present and pointed gun at the teacher. She fled into the hallway and went to get help. The shooter surrendered a short time later to a police officer. Shooter had a list of 8 teacher's names and 50 rounds of ammo. Shooter had no prior problems or documented issues at the school. It was reported that the student had issues at prior school he attended. No shots fired.

Summary: Fired during a fist fight striking 2 students who were not involved
Narrative: 15YOM started firing during a fist fight outside of the school. A 21 YOM was also charged in connection with the fight. 2 uninvolved students were struck in the crossfire.

Summary: Botched robbery in school hallway
Narrative: Three teenagers attempted to rob 2 students near the bathroom in the school hallway. When the male student refused to give his money, one of the three teens pulled a gun and fired multiple shot hitting both of them. The three suspects fled and were not identified. The school was locked down.

Summary: Man having affair with basketball coach's wife, attacked them in school parking lot
Narrative: 39YOM basketball coach shot wife and assistant coach (having an affair with his wife) in the parking lot of the school.

Summary: Bus driver with rifle kidnapped 13 students and drove them 150 miles to area near Washington, DC
Narrative: 63 YOM bus driver with semi auto rifle kidnapped 13 students and drove them 150 miles from their school to Landover, MD. Bus driver surrendered to a security guard at a family dollar store. Bus driver had recently stopped taking drugs to control schizophrenia and had become obsessed with the 9/11 attacks.

School: Martin Luther King, Jr. High School
Summary: Two boys teased a girl and pulled a bandana (gang colors) off her head; shot by her boyfriend
